description: a(n) = smallest k such that Sum_{ i = 1..k } 1/prime(i) exceeds n.
comments: The corresponding primes prime(a(n)) are in A016088.Index m for which the prime harmonic number p[ m ] := Sum[ 1/Prime[ k ],{k,1,m} ] >= n.
links: E. Bach, D. Klyve, J. P. Sorenson, Computing prime harmonic sums, Math. Comp. 78 (2009) 2283-2305
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Prime Number.
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Harmonic Series of Primes
formula: a(n) = A000720(A016088(n)) = A000720(A096232(n))+1. - _Jonathan Sondow_, Apr 17 2013a(n) = e^(e^(n + O(1))), see comment in A223037. - _Jonathan Sondow_, Apr 17 2013; corrected by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 22 2013a(n) = A103591(2*n). - _Michel Marcus_, Aug 22 2013
prog: (PARI) a(n)=my(t); forprime(p=2,, t+=1./p; if(t>n, return(p))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 29 2015
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: a(4) found by Tom√°s Oliveira e Silva (tos(AT)det.ua.pt), using the fourth term of A016088. - Dec 14 2005
